thread.section_title: Maison Athenee - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location. Excellent service
thread.title_full: Perfect location. Excellent service - Review of Maison Athenee, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Seabass305
title: Perfect location. Excellent service
text:
This hotel is conveniently located in one of the best neighborhoods in Paris. Only two blocks from all the malls and surrounded by a lot of restaurant options from inexpensive unique French places to walking distance to Hotel Costess.
I stayed at the hotel for 9 nights and I got to deal with every employee who worked the front desk. What an amazing team. Everyone showed me great hospitality. they were very nice giving me directions and even helped me booking a private BJJ class in Paris
The hotel lobby was my favorite part. Wifi always works. And the â‚¬18 breakfast is delicious and they bring it to your room
